solution_line_template: Since {minutes_per_hour} minutes equal 1 hour, in {hours_blouses} hours, Eliza ironed blouses for {hours_blouses} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{hours_blouses}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes_blouses}>>{total_minutes_blouses} minutes.

Since {minutes_per_hour} minutes equal 1 hour, in {hours_dresses} hours, Eliza ironed dresses for {hours_dresses} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{hours_dresses}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_minutes_dresses}>>{total_minutes_dresses} minutes.
In total, Eliza ironed {num_blouses} + {num_dresses} = <<{num_blouses}+{num_dresses}={total_pieces_of_clothes}>>{total_pieces_of_clothes} pieces of clothes.
